name: Flopparena
description:
Physics and Fighting, What Could Go Wrong?

You control a table-top game character with no bones and only one goal in mind: Become the next Flopp Champion, a legendary title only the most powerful of Flopps have.


Fight waves of enemies, beat bosses, obtain the Sword, and become the Flopp Champion!
Choose from the two current game modes, Endless; fight endless enemies, train for your impossible goal, and see how long you survive. Or the Challenge; Use your combat skills to beat down loads of enemies, fight David, earn the Sword of the Boneless, fight even MORE enemies, then take on the Mightiest of all enemies... FREDERICK. Oh and also fight some more enemies along the way.

Good Luck!

This game is AWESOME! - Retired Flopp
